title: RemoveActionList (Method)
text:
METHOD RemoveActionList : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Removes a action list and action list text at index nIndex from the Action-BACnet-Propetrty and Action_Text-BACnetProperty of this BACnet-Command-Object at the same time.
So both description and action are removed simultaneously.

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the action list (and text) to remove.
